reviewText: Bleach Uncut Season 2 Box Set Ichigo and his friends enter the Soul Society to save Rukia, and Ichigo faces enemies that are more and more powerful. Yoruichi reveals her true form and i chigo faces Captains Zaraki Kenpachi and Biyakyu Kuchiki. Will the daily growing power of Ichigo be enough to save Rukia and what does the death of Aizen mean to the story? Well worth the price.
